Detailed Description

A guider control object simulates the axes of a tip/tilt optics system.

This simulation simply sets the actual position to the demand position as if the system reacts instantaneously.

const tpk::Trajectory &  tip,
const tpk::Trajectory &  tilt 
) [virtual]

Update optics tip/tilt.

The x and y axes are set to the tip and tilt demands subjects to the low and high limits.

Parameters:

tip  tip demand
tilt  tilt demand
